sentences.en: A third of accidental deaths occur in the home.
sentences.cn: 有三分之一的意外死亡发生在家里。

sentences.en: About two in every five epileptic fits occur during sleep.
sentences.cn: 每5例癫痫病中约有两例是在睡眠过程中发作的。

sentences.en: Changes in temperature occur slowly and are constrained within relatively tight bounds.
sentences.cn: 温度变化缓慢，而且局限在相对较小的范围内。

sentences.en: Emergency cooling systems could fail and a reactor meltdown could occur.
sentences.cn: 紧急冷却系统有可能失灵，核反应堆有可能发生堆芯熔毁。

sentences.en: If these drugs are stopped abruptly then some withdrawal symptoms may occur.
sentences.cn: 如果突然停服这些药，则可能出现一些戒断症状。

sentences.en: Keep a pad handy to jot down queries as they occur.
sentences.cn: 手边放一本便笺簿，以便有问题时随时记下。

sentences.en: Mental and physical deterioration both occur naturally with age.
sentences.cn: 随着年龄的增长,心智和体力自然衰退.

sentences.en: Nitrates are chemicals that occur naturally in water and the soil.
sentences.cn: 硝酸盐是水和土壤中自然存在的化学物质。

sentences.en: No one has suggested how this might occur.
sentences.cn: 没人说得清这事是怎么发生的。

sentences.en: Some movement in the building will occur as It'settles into the subsoil.
sentences.cn: 楼房沉到下层土时,楼里就会有动静.

sentences.en: The word " gratitude " did not occur in his words.
sentences.cn: “ 感激 ” 两字在他的话中是见不到的.

sentences.en: There will come a time when the crisis will occur.
These snails do not occur on low-lying coral islands.
sentences.cn: 这些蜗牛不会出现在低洼的珊瑚岛上。

sentences.en: Unless you respect other people's religions, horrible mistakes and conflict will occur.
sentences.cn: 如果不尊重别人的宗教信仰，就会祷下大错，酿成冲突。

sentences.en: When exactly did the incident occur?
sentences.cn: 这一事件究竟是什么时候发生的？

sentences.en: When vacancies occur, the office puts out feelers to the universities.
sentences.cn: 有空缺职位的时候，办事处就到各个大学去打探。

sentences.en: Whooping cough occurs mainly in young children.

words.tran_cn: 正在发生的；偶然发生的
